dmca.title: The Music Box sings of copying
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern:

I am writing to file a charge that virgiledeluxemburgo6.blogspot.com is in violation of U.S. copyright laws.  I have a signature on file under:

[private]
Editor, The Music Box
[private]@musicbox-online.com

The infringing article was posted on June 13, 2007 and can be found at:
http://virgiledeluxemeburgo6.blogspot.com/2997/06/perry-farrells-satellite-party-ultra.html

My copyrighted work at issue was published at:
http://www.musicbox-online.com/reviews-2007/satellite-party-ultra-payloaded-06132007.html

The posting of these materials infringes upon the copyrights of me and my company The Music Box.  I may be contacted at the email address and phone number listed below.

Blogspot can be reached at:

Google Inc.
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
[private]@google.com
+[private]
Fax- +[private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,
[private]
Editor, The Music Box
[private]@musicbox-online.com
[private]
